content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetNetworks path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ipam/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/networks content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all vpc networks
responses
200
networkgetnetworksresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
networknetwork
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a networks unique identifier
name
type str
desc a networks humanreadable name
slug
type str
desc a networks machinereadable name
networkmetadata
type obj
props
networkstringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
createdat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was created
nullable true
updatedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable true
deleterequestedat
type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that an entity was requested for deletion
nullable true
version
type str
desc an entitys version number

versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
desc metadata associated with an entity
rootsubnet
type str
desc a subnet identifier and network mask in cidr notation format

a networks root subnet is its primary subnet
virtualnetworkidentifier
type integer
format int32
desc a networks vlan identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack that a network belongs to
desc a network defined within a virtual private cloud
desc the requested vpc networks
title: 34_Virtual Private Cloud_GetNetworks_194.json
